I tried the HexOS Beta, the new Linus backed Home Server NAS operating system. Here's how it went.

{% include embed/youtube.html id='Vyyq0_aOkIo' %}
üì∫ [Watch Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vyyq0_aOkIo)

## Disclosures

- I was invited to the beta however I purchased my own license before testing it and recording this video

## Info

I was invited to test out the recently announced beta of HexOS, a NAS operating system that's attempting to shake up the home server market with simplicity built on a modern, solid foundation.  Here's what I think about it.

You can read more about HexOS here: <https://hexos.com/>
